TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EnvironmentVariableTarget extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在 Set 或 Get 操作中存储或检索环境变量的位置。

span.span: Specifies the location where an environment variable is stored or retrieved in a set or get operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举由 、和方法的某些重载用于指定存储或检索环境变量的名称和值的位置或目标。 The enumeration is used by certain overloads of the , , and methods to specify the location, or target, where the name and value of an environment variable is stored or retrieved. 目标可以是以下三个位置之一:The target can be one of three locations: - 与当前进程关联的环境块 (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Process`)。The environment block associated with the current process (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Process`). 用户在设置操作中创建环境变量。The user creates the environment variable in a set operation. 进程终止后, 操作系统将销毁该进程中的环境变量。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. - 为与当前用户关联的环境变量 (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.User`) 保留的 Windows 操作系统注册表项。The Windows operating system registry key reserved for environment variables associated with the current user (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.User`). 在 Windows 系统中, 当用户在设置操作中创建环境变量时, 操作系统将环境变量存储在系统注册表中, 而不是在当前进程中。On Windows systems, when the user creates the environment variable in a set operation, the operating system stores the environment variable in the system registry, but not in the current process. 如果用户启动新进程, 操作系统会将环境变量从注册表复制到该进程。If the user starts a new process, the operating system copies the environment variable from the registry to that process. 进程终止后, 操作系统将销毁该进程中的环境变量。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. 但是, 注册表中的环境变量将一直持续, 直到用户以编程方式或通过操作系统工具删除它。However, the environment variable in the registry persists until the user removes it programmatically or by means of an operating system tool. 在基于 Unix 的系统上`EnvironmentVariable.User` , 尝试创建的环境变量不起作用, 尝试使用`EnvironmentVariable.User`返回`null` (在中C#) 或`Nothing` (在 Visual Basic 中) 来检索环境变量。On Unix-based systems, an attempt to create an enviroment variable with `EnvironmentVariable.User` has no effect, and an attempt to retrieve an enviroment variable using `EnvironmentVariable.User` returns `null` (in C#) or `Nothing` (in Visual Basic). - 为与本地计算机上的所有用户关联的环境变量 (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine`) 保留的注册表项。The registry key reserved for environment variables associated with all users on the local machine (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine`). 当用户在设置操作中创建环境变量时, 操作系统将环境变量存储在系统注册表中, 而不是存储在当前进程中。When a user creates the environment variable in a set operation, the operating system stores the environment variable in the system registry, but not in the current process. 如果本地计算机上的任何用户启动新进程, 操作系统会将环境变量从注册表复制到该进程。If any user on the local machine starts a new process, the operating system copies the environment variable from the registry to that process. 进程终止后, 操作系统将销毁该进程中的环境变量。When the process terminates, the operating system destroys the environment variable in that process. 但是, 注册表中的环境变量将一直持续, 直到用户以编程方式或通过操作系统工具删除它。However, the environment variable in the registry persists until a user removes it programmatically or by means of an operating system tool. 在基于 Unix 的系统上`EnvironmentVariable.Machine` , 尝试创建的环境变量不起作用, 尝试使用`EnvironmentVariable.Machine`返回`null` (在中C#) 或`Nothing` (在 Visual Basic 中) 来检索环境变量。On Unix-based systems, an attempt to create an enviroment variable with `EnvironmentVariable.Machine` has no effect, and an attempt to retrieve an enviroment variable using `EnvironmentVariable.Machine` returns `null` (in C#) or `Nothing` (in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下面的示例在创建 、检索和删除环境变量的方法中使用枚举。The following example uses the enumeration in methods that create, retrieve, and delete environment variables. 该示例的输出显示, 在未指定`EnvironmentVariableTarget`值的情况下存储和检索的环境变量存储在与当前进程关联的环境块 (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Process`) 中。The output from the example shows that environmnent variables stored and retrieved without specifying a `EnvironmentVariableTarget` value are stored in the environment block associated with the current process (`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Process`). 基于 Unix 的系统的示例输出还表明, 尝试使用以外的值`EnvironmentVariableTarget.Process`定义环境变量将被忽略。The example output from Unix-based systems also shows that attempts to define an environment variable with a value other than `EnvironmentVariableTarget.Process` is ignored. [!code-csharp[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/CS/gsev.cs)] [!code-vb[environment.getsetenvar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.getsetenvar/VB/gsev.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget Machine = int32(2)

summary.span: 在 Windows 操作系统注册表的 项中存储或从其中检索环境变量。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the key in the Windows operating system registry.

summary.span: 此值应仅用于在 Windows 系统上运行的 .NET 实现。

span.span: This value should be used on .NET implementations running on Windows systems only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget Process = int32(0)

summary.span: 环境变量存储在与当前进程关联的环境块中，或者从其中检索。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the environment block associated with the current process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnvironmentVariableTarget User = int32(1)

summary.span: 在 Windows 操作系统注册表的 项中存储或从其中检索环境变量。

span.span: The environment variable is stored or retrieved from the key in the Windows operating system registry.

summary.span: 此值应仅用于在 Windows 系统上运行的 .NET 实现。

span.span: This value should be used on .NET implementations running on Windows systems only.
